it.polimi.se2019.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.player.PlayerBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that manages the damages and the marks suffered by the player and the points obtainable at the player's next death
    See Also:
